        Code:

            #include <stdio.h>
            #include <stdlib.h>

            int main() {
                int N;
                scanf("%d", &N);
                int* tops = NULL;
                if (N > 0) {
                    tops = (int*)malloc(N * sizeof(int));
                    // Check allocation if needed? 
                }
                int k = 0;

                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                    int A;
                    scanf("%d", &A);

                    int low = -1;         // bad
                    int high = k;          // good
                    while (high - low > 1) {
                        int mid = (low + high) / 2;
                        if (tops[mid] < A) {
                            high = mid;
                        } else {
                            low = mid;
                        }
                    }

                    if (high == k) {
                        if (k < N) {
                            tops[k] = A;
                        }
                        k++;
                    } else {
                        tops[high] = A;
                    }
                }

                if (tops) {
                    free(tops);
                }

                int current_n = k;
                for (int i = k; i >= 1; i--) {
                    if (current_n % i == 0) {
                        current_n = i;
                        printf("%d ", i);
                    }
                }

                return 0;
            }
